reviews.review: Çalışılması gereken, aim'i zor olan oyunlardan birisi. CS:GO GİBİ DEĞİL !
Поу поу мазефака, олдфаги полюсуют, гавноедов прессуют!

You cannot be called a PC gamer if you have never played Counter-Strike before. This mod from the phenomenal Half-Life FPS game franchise from Valve must be admittedly phenomenal. Not only appears as a standard for military shooter games which were born afterwards, Counter Strike was also born as one of the most competitive professional level games in the past.
С каждым годом все сложнее и сложнее в нее играть)))
this is a great game... Got it and 2 others for a dollar. Thanks gabe

Este jogo é bem legal, apesar de ser bem velho ainda tem bastante players. Se você procura diversão com tiro e não tem um computador bom esse jogo foi feito ''para você'', estou me divertindo jogando ele e recomendo
